name: Unidentified_hyperspace_scout_2
content:
A male Human was a hyperspace scout. The Human scout had light brown hair, dark eyes, and fair skin. On one occasion, he looked at a hyperspace map with another hyperspace scout while wearing a gray shirt and a brown jacket.
The Human hyperspace scout was first mentioned in a caption for a picture illustrated by Chris Trevas in The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry and published in 2009. This scout is an in-universe drawing of one of the co-authors, Daniel Wallace. The picture that contains this scout also contains a drawing of the other half of the co-authorship, Jason Fry. Aurebesh included in the picture translates into "Unknown."
